title: Welcome to tidepredictor
text:
Welcome to tidepredictor

See more in Getting started
A complete reference is available here

title: get_default_constituent_path
text:

Get the default path to the constituent file.

title: UtideAdapter
text:
UtideAdapter(self, constituent_repo, type)
Adapter for the utide tide predictor engine.











Name
Type
Description
Default




constituent_repo
ConstituentRepository
Repository
required


type
PredictionType
The type of prediction to make.
required









Name
Description




predict
Predict tide levels or currents using utide.





UtideAdapter.predict(lon, lat, start, end, interval=timedelta(hours=1))
Predict tide levels or currents using utide.











Name
Type
Description
Default




lon
float
The longitude.
required


lat
float
The latitude.
required


start
datetime
The start date.
required


end
datetime
The end date.
required


interval
timedelta
The interval between predictions.
timedelta(hours=1)









Name
Type
Description





pl.DataFrame
The predicted tide levels or currents.






The workhorse of this functions the reconstruct function from UTide

title: NetCDFConstituentRepository
text:
NetCDFConstituentRepository(self, fp)
A repository of tidal constituents stored in a NetCDF file.





Name
Description




get_current_constituents
Get the current constituents for a given longitude and latitude.


get_level_constituents
Get the level constituents for a given longitude and latitude.





NetCDFConstituentRepository.get_current_constituents(lon, lat)
Get the current constituents for a given longitude and latitude.





Name
Type
Description
Default




lon
float
The longitude.
required


lat
float
The latitude.
required









Name
Type
Description





dict[str, CurrentConstituent]
The current constituents.







NetCDFConstituentRepository.get_level_constituents(lon, lat)
Get the level constituents for a given longitude and latitude.





Name
Type
Description
Default




lon
float
The longitude.
required


lat
float
The latitude.
required









Name
Type
Description





dict[str, LevelConstituent]
The level constituents.

title: API Reference
text:
UtideAdapter
Adapter for the utide tide predictor engine.


NetCDFConstituentRepository
A repository of tidal constituents stored in a NetCDF file.


get_default_constituent_path
Get the default path to the constituent file.


PredictionType

title: Getting started
text:
Install the tidepredictor package from the distributed wheel file.

pip install tidepredictor-*.whl

Copy constituent files (.nc files) to the ~/.local/share/tidepredictor directory.

title: Getting started
text:
